title: Windows 10 Spring Creators Update EN-US x64 17134.112 RTM ISO
description: This is the RS4 Windows 10 Spring Creators Update EN-GB x64 Final Release 17134.1 1803 RTM final version with the 17134.112 Cumulative Updates integrated into it. It was made from the official MSV Windows 10 April 2018 Update ISO. The Enterprise, Enterprise N and ServerRdsh indexes have been added to it so you have the option to install those as well on a clean install. No updates will install on a clean install from this ISO except for Defender updates and the Malicious Software Tool update. If you never installed your motherboard, hardware and video drivers etc. before running Windows Update they may install as well. It has every 64-bit version of Windows 10 on it including Enterprise, Professional, Home, Workstation, Education and including the N versions and ServerRdsh. It also includes the Professional versions of Workstation, Education, WorkstationN and EducationN. It will fit on a 4GB USB key. Download RUFUS here to make a GPT install USB. https://rufus.akeo.ie/ It is NOT cracked! You'll need to have already installed Windows 10 or have a valid license key to do a activate a clean install of this ISO
